data.message: Actually disappointed with this. Not for the mediocre freestyle but for the fact that he's playing in to the left/right "us vs. them" mentality. Straight up telling anyone who disagrees with him fuck you. It takes zero balls to bash Trump, as 99 percent of the entertainment industry does. Sorry, Em, but this just sucks.

replies.message: 💯 facts the old man lost it smh

I've always loved Marshall. And I don't mind if he has 100% different beliefs than me. I always respected him (even if I disagreed with him, because I love his artistry). It's just so disappointing to know that due to the differing opinions, I am not welcome to be his fan now. To tell your fans that love you "fuck you"....that's the only part I care about. You can't watch TV, movies or listen to music now without hearing about politics. Seriously disappointing. 😔
crybaby

it's not about a difference in opinion, it's between right and wrong and that's why he's saying it. he's a big boy and gets to make big boy choices, including ones regarding his fans. if he says this, im not sure he minds to have lost you?
Aaaaayyyyyyeee
Trump is in the entertainment industry.
He's told everyone "fuck you" since the beginning of his career soooo...
Brooke Sturgell Which part is right and which is wrong? What has trump done that was racist?
Brooke Sturgell  he should mind his money comes from fans sales his stature came from his fans keeping him relevant after all his trash music he’s put out he took a L here
LOL Eminem......great shit
It's humans and humanity vs racism and fascism if you don't get that there is a side to pic in that situation, you're part of the problem.
He's always been political. This shouldn't surprise anyone.
Letícia Scolaro Bully.

Brooke Sturgell Obviously he does not care, that's why he said it. And the "between right and wrong" is your opinion, not fact. I definitely don't agree with everything Donald Trump stands for, but I didn't agree with anything Hillary stood for which is why I did not vote for her. And she was not the "right" choice.
Shelly Brown-Rainey Those are opinions, not facts.
You mean the us/them mentality that your own government has been perpetuating since it was founded so people wouldn't rise up against it together? yeah, solid argument, sheep.
Jen Somesing Seifert Exactly. And he's been consumed by it. Thanks for proving my point. Lol
like Trump does? 🖕
Floyd Paul Are you even a real profile? Pretty sad if so
Em has been saying fuck you since day one!! Think he cares if peeps hate on him.... cause you know that's never been the case before or anything.  Haha.
lol tell me more about the mediocre freestyle and what lyrical flow advice you'd give him.
Todd Grizzle is this sarcasm or would you like a real answer? I'd be happy to answer!

Ashli Morett Why is that just because I oppose Donald Trump Im immediately FOR Hillary Clinton? The election was between a door knob and a fork. A really hard choice, but one isn't a millionaire, racist bigot who pardons other racists and bigots and distracts people from real HUMAN problems like Puerto Rico, Vegas, natural disasters of all kinds with protesting the NFL with, you guessed it, ANOTHER PROTEST.
